config.script:
state = self.props.selected
	if state:
		self.getSibling("StartDate").props.enabled = False
		self.getSibling("EndDate").props.enabled = False
		self.view.custom.Date.Enabled = False
	else:
		self.getSibling("StartDate").props.enabled = True
		self.getSibling("EndDate").props.enabled = True
		self.view.custom.Date.Enabled = True

config.expression:
runScript("mes.trace.sp.getParts", 0, 
	if({view.custom.Date.StartTime} = "", None, {view.custom.Date.StartTime}), // Start Date
	if({view.custom.Date.EndTime} = "", None, {view.custom.Date.EndTime}), // End Date
	if({view.custom.Label} = "" || {view.custom.Label} = "None", None, {view.custom.Label}), // Label
	False, //Label Exact Match
	if({view.custom.ProductCode} = "" || {view.custom.ProductCode} = "None", None, {view.custom.ProductCode}),//Product Code ID
	if({view.custom.Workorder} = "" || {view.custom.Workorder} = "None", None, {view.custom.Workorder}), //Workorder
	None, // InventoryID
	None, /// Accumulator ID
	False, //Get Completed Only
	False) /// Get WIP Only

transforms.code:
#options = [{ "label": "All", "value": ""  }]
	options = []
	pydata = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	
	for row in pydata:
		label = row["Label"]
		value = row["Label"]
		options.append({ "label": label, "value": label })
		
	return options

onChange.script:
if currentValue == None:
		pass
	if previousValue == None:
		self.view.custom.Label = currentValue
		self.view.custom.PartSelection = False
		#self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Main").getChild("Table").refreshBinding('props.data')
		#self.props.value = None
	elif currentValue != '' or None:
		self.view.custom.Label = currentValue
		self.view.custom.PartSelection = False
		#elf.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Main").getChild("Table").refreshBinding('props.data')
		#self.props.value = None
	else:
		self.props.value = ''
		#self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Main").getChild("Table").refreshBinding('props.data')

config.script:
TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	TestType = self.view.custom.SelectedTestName
	if TestID > 0:
		messageType = 'refreshQualityTable' 
		payload = {}
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')
		system.perspective.navigate(view = 'App/Quality/Test Edit/FullView', params = {'TestID':TestID})
		#system.perspective.openPopup('AttributeScreen', 'App/Quality/Embedded/AttributesScreen', params = {'TestID':TestID, 'TestType':TestType}, shoeCloseIcon = False, modal = True, resizeable = False, title = 'View/Edit Test')

#	TestID = self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data[0].ID
#	mes.quality.sp.disableTest(TestID)
#	
#	
#	self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []
#	
#	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable' 
#	payload = {}
#	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')
	pass

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'Approved'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []
	else:
		pass
	
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'Awaiting Review'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []

	else:
		pass
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'Unapproved'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)

	else:

	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'

	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID

		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []

	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'

customMethods.name: rotateIcon
customMethods.script:
import time
	
	# Rotate icon 360 degrees.
	for degree in range(0,361, 10):
		self.props.style.transform = 'rotate(' + str(degree) + 'deg)'
		time.sleep(0.0278)

noData.text: No test found in selected filters.

messageHandlers.script:
self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("SelectedItems").getChild("EndDate").refreshBinding("props.value")
	self.props.selection.selectedColumn = None
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = None
	self.props.selection.data = []
	self.refreshBinding("props.data")
